title: Tweet from null
detailed_content:
Want to hear more?

Watch Anthony during #CCSummit presenting a first design and proof-of-concept of a Delegated Federated Learning framework, which relies on blockchain and several TEE technologies (Intel SGX, TDX, and nVidia Hopper Confidential Compute) to implement an industry-grade Trusted and Confidential AI platform.

 June 6, 4:05 PM - 4:25 PM PST
